name: Shield Corp
description:
*The game was working in the editor but it doesn't work in the build :)))*

I love unity <3

Movement: WASD

Shield Rotation: Mouse Position

Dash: Space

Sprint: Shift

---------------------------------------------

When the "shift" starts, enemies will start to spawn. Killing enemies will drop shop points that you can use to upgrade your shield and player. If break time starts, you can leave the "battlefield" and go to the shop for safety but you will sacrifice the number of points you can earn in the wave. Have Fun!

---------------------------------------------

this game was made in under four days during the Game U Game Jam!

Made by "The Interns" Cole Sladowsky and Marcus Simonelli
